trans-unit.source: Controls access to Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) servers.
trans-unit.target: 控制 Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) 伺服器的存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermission> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermissionAttribute> classes control access to SMTP host computers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermission>和<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermissionAttribute>類別控制 SMTP 主機電腦的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class demands an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermission> when sending electronic mail to the SMTP host for delivery.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>類別要求<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermission>時傳送電子郵件傳遞的 SMTP 主機。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpAccess> enumeration specifies the level of access controlled by an instance of this permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpAccess>列舉值會指定受此權限的執行個體的存取層級。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> values that specifies the permission behavior.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 值，指定使用權限行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermissionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermissionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The security action defines which callers must have the permission.
trans-unit.target: 「 安全性 」 動作定義的呼叫端必須具備權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of access to SMTP servers controlled by the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由屬性 (Attribute) 所控制之 SMTP 伺服器的存取層級。

trans-unit.source: If you specify an invalid value when setting this property, the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> method will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> when called by the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定無效的值設定這個屬性時，<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>時，由系統呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission object that can be stored with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> in an assembly's metadata.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用權限物件，該物件可以使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 儲存在組件的中繼資料 (Metadata) 中。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 只應該由應用程式程式碼永遠不會由安全性系統中，呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes are converted into security declarations and stored in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期，會轉換成安全性宣告屬性，然後將其儲存在 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 中繼資料中。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the security declarations in metadata are used to create permission objects that map to the state described in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段中繼資料中的安全性宣告可用來建立權限的物件會對應至中繼資料中描述的狀態。
